skills.skill: Integration of audio, video, CCTV, access control, and automation systems

duties_responsibilities.duty: Successful design and implementation of audio, video, CCTV, access control, and automation systems.
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve system issues.
Work closely with the dynamic team to ensure customer needs are met.
Require some travel domestic and international travel.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5 years' experience in the integration of audio, video, CCTV, access control, and automation systems. Relevant certifications in the industry are a plus. PLT license a plus. Proven ability to handle complex projects with precision.
